sections.heading: 1-Year
goals: Learn to code in more languages.
Get into a healthy workout routine.
Launch a web studio with my peers.

sections.heading: 5-Year
goals: Attract 10+ business per year through the web studio.
Travel 15+ countries and learn their culture.
Be fluent in a new language.

sections.heading: 10-Year
goals: Be a wonderful father to my kids.
Meditate and bring joy to my workspace.
